item.title: [DISTRELEC-5116] Vaucher is not showing in order of "My Account"
item.description:
case:
Open the newly placed order in the order history

exception:

  • order contains voucher info

fact:
the vaucher calculation is not shown in the order of "my account" .
in the order confirmation of received mail is the vaucher calculated.
item.summary: Vaucher is not showing in order of "My Account"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Francesco,
Could you please check if we get the information in the order histroy.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5110] Case 1, B2B (C2) - Activate existing offline contact of existing offline customer for online
item.description:
Prior to test email address of contact needs to be changed in SAP otherwise the real person gets the activcation mail.
Offline customer + Contact:
1000081 DB Services Nord GmbH Rathkamp Ralf distrelec.testing+de.b2b.ex2@gmail.com
item.summary: Case 1, B2B (C2) - Activate existing offline contact of existing offline customer for online

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
During the test with above data soap call result is CONTACT_NOT_FOUND
Request 

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soap:Body><ns2:FindContactRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris"><salesOrganization>7350</salesOrganization><customerId>1000081</customerId><vatNumber></vatNumber><organizationNumber></organizationNumber><firstName>Ralf</firstName><lastName>Rathkamp</lastName><email>distrelec.testing+de.b2b.ex2@gmail.com</email></ns2:FindContactRequest></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>

Response

<SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/'><SOAP:Header/><SOAP:Body><ns1:FindContactResponse xmlns:ns1='http://www.distrelec.com/hybris'><customerStatus>CUSTOMER_NOT_FOUND</customerStatus><contactStatus>CONTACT_NOT_FOUND</contactStatus></ns1:FindContactResponse></SOAP:Body></SOAP:Envelope>
Business Logic attached. B2B-Cases fail all at the red marked part. VAT-ID and Organizational Number should not be mandatory for germany.

Hi Urs
the IF-08 Find Customer method, for germany should return the customer even if vatId and Organizational Number are not specified.

Coudl you please check the logic in SAP?

The request and response is in the comment above this one.

Hi Ligia
Could you check why SAP does not find this contact?

Hi Evangelos,

I implemented the correction as we discussed. Please test in Q10 and approve the transport to P10 if all is ok.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hi Francesco
The customer will be found now.
Regards, Urs

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5040] NewSAP IF-03 missing data for warehouse 7351
item.description:
Hi Evangelos,
we expect to receive stock data for Schuricht Warehouse (7351) from NewSAP. We already receive stock data for several other WHs (7373, 7641, 7791, ...) but not 7351.
Can you please setup the export job? (or is our expectation wrong?)

Thank you!
Cheers,
Adrian
item.summary: NewSAP IF-03 missing data for warehouse 7351

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hello Adrian,
There is no data stored in the Q system under 7351. The warehouse is already included in the job.
@Evangelos: We need stock data for testing. Can you make them available for Q?
I started the job and made sure that all warehouses are included in the export. Please let me know if you don't have the files by tomorrow.

@Evangelos: I receive some stock files but not data for 7351.

-rw-rw-r-- 1 50002 hybris 23158126 Sep 12 02:02 erp_stock-20140912015948426.csv
-rw-rw-r-- 1 50002 hybris 23158462 Sep 13 02:56 erp_stock-20140913025431595.csv
-rw-rw-r-- 1 50002 hybris 23158129 Sep 14 02:20 erp_stock-20140914021813409.csv
-rw-rw-r-- 1 50002 hybris 12080098 Sep 15 23:39 erp_stock-20140915233840001.csv
-rw-rw-r-- 1 50002 hybris 23158464 Sep 17 03:47 erp_stock-20140917034501767.csv

Hello Adrian,
As we discussed yesterday I have only 16 records in 7351 and I am not sure even if the articles exist there. As I mentioned yesterday plant 7351 will have no stock but instead 7372 is the warehouse that will be ramped down.But also in the Q system for 7372 I have no stock available only 10 lines are there.

In a phone call with Evangelos I learned that DE will not base on warehouse 7351.
=> DE is based on warehouse 7371 (fast) and 7372 (slow) instead.

I updated the documentation https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistSalesOrg and configuration (ImpEx).

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3220] OCI/Ariba Conversion-Tracking
item.description: Requested: Transmitting the conversion-values to Webtrekk at the time as the values are transmitted via the OCI- and Ariba-environment to the according ERP-system of the customers. Technically spoken a Webtrekk function call via event-handler (onclick) has to be a generated. Detailed requirements are specified in the attached Spec-file (Distrelec_Webtrekk_OCI-Ariba-Spec_new-Webshop_MDI_I-1.0_2014-02-13.doc).

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Todo: Make an estimation. Everything must be transmitted via JS.

My estimation is below. I assign this ticket to Dishan so he can review the Backend estimation.

Frontend

  • Add new Tracking Function to Webtrekk JS 0.5 d
  • Process JSON Data and fire Tracking Event 1.0 d
  • Testing 0.5 d

Backend

  • Provide Values: OCI / Ariba, orderID 0.25 d
  • Change Page Params 10 and 9 to “oci / ariba” and “ct” 0.25 d
  • Provide all Product currently in the Cart via Ajax or as JSON inside the Page for the Frontend 1.0 d
  • Testing 0.5 d

• We cannot provide an orderID, since the OCI and Ariba customers do not place their order in our shop (hybris), it goes directly to the erp.
  • Change Page Params 10 and 9 to “oci / ariba” and “ct” 0.25 d - OK
  • Provide all Product currently in the Cart via Ajax or as JSON inside the Page for the Frontend 1.0 d - OK
  • Testing 0.5 d - OK

The orderID can be neglected in this case.

For Ariba please use the value 'arb' as specified in the WT-Spec.

Thx Mark

On 09 Apr 2014, at 11:03, Zamofing, Laurent <laurent.zamofing@distrelec.com> wrote:
> Hello René
>
> I start working on the DISTRELEC-3220 and I have a quick question. Florian told me to ask you.
> The tracking should be done on the “Gehe zu ERP” (/cart) button or on the “SAP OCI Buyer” (/checkout) button?

Hello Laurent

The "SAP OCI Buyer"-Button is not visible for the customers (this is only for the Developers to check the form).
On the Live-System this ist an automatic form submit.

So I would track the “Gehe zu ERP”

Regards
René

Hello René

As I can see in the source code, the button Gehe zu ERP is part of the mod-checkout-title.
In this case, I have added a js file (checkout-title.js) and I have added the subscrition to the channel and the listened on the button :

on: function (callback) {
	// subscribe to connector channel/s
	this.sandbox.subscribe('webtrekk', this); // for ?.? events tracking
		
	$('.btn-checkout').click(function(e) {
		// Fire Update to Shopping List Meta Actions
		this.fire('WebtrekkOCIAribaCheckoutTracking', cartData.entries, ['webtrekk']);
			
	});
}

I have also added a function in webtrekk.js who is called on the button click event

// Webtrekk: ?.? OCI and Ariba checkout

onWebtrekkOCIAribaCheckoutTracking: function(myWebtrekkObj) {
	// Show webtrekk data in console for dev
	if($('body').hasClass('skin-layout-dev')) {
		info('Webtrekk: ?.? OCI & Ariba customer checkout (activated: always)');
		dir(myWebtrekkObj);
	}

	var  webtrekkObj = this.addCustomParamsToMyWebtrekkObj(myWebtrekkObj);

	// Trigger webtrekk
	try {
		wt.sendinfo(webtrekkObjSendOnUnload);
	}
	catch (e) { 
		error('Webtrekk', '?.? OCI & Ariba customer checkout — Can not trigger addClickParameter '); 
	}
},

I have tried to get the products informations in the checkout-title.js file but I think I will not be able to access them because I'm not in the right context. In this case, where is the rights place to make this code ? Is it right to create the json file in checkout-title.js and send it to the WebtrekkOCIAribaCheckoutTracking function as a parameter?

Thank you

Hi Dominic

Do you know where this tracking should be placed?

Hi Laurent

the variable "cartData" does not exist. if you need to track every product in the cart, the data needs to come from somewhere.

i suggest we skype about this and implement it together. your solution looks basically right, except that there is no cart data.

We skype later today, but here already the steps that we need to do:

1) provide necessary data from the backend to the frontend
2) add new webtrekk function to webtrekk.js
3) document it here https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation
4) test communication and transmitted data, compare with requirements in the word doc
I am still blocked because of the webtrekk js.gz file encoding / mime type problem, which is described here: DISTRELEC-3568
The frontend Part of the ticket is done. The Page parameter still need to be adjusted according to the spec document.

Done.

Mark, can you check please?

Hi Laurent

Please inform me on how (-> Links) I can test the implementation (OCI & Ariba) on Q.

Thx Mark

Hello

You have to create a Customer (b2c) and after to change it to an OCI (groups).
Here is the link you should use to test : https://distrelec-ch.local:9002/ociEntry?username=USERLOGIN&password=USERPASSWORD&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

We can do it together, please contact me on lync when you have time.

Regards,

Laurent
@Mark: Can you please test and either close or comment the ticket? Thank you!

Hi Flo

I cannot access the test-link indicated by Laurent.
Who can I approach to clarify on how to proceed regarding testing the impelementation?

Thx Mark

Hi All,

Apparently, the code for this feature was checkedin in trunk. Before it can be tested on Q, it needs to be merged back to branch v2.0. Please see attached changelog file. Since the changelog contains a lot of frontend files, Adrian cannot do the merge process alone and I need to assist him. So we will merge it back on Monday, 11.8.2014 after my vacation.

Mark Diggelmann | Distrelec: After the merge is done and a deployment was made, you can test it on Q. Since Laurent is not here anymore and he did the backend part, I guess it can be tested with this link: http://test.distrelec.ch:9002/ociEntry?username=USERLOGIN&password=USERPASSWORD&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0
For testing it, you have to create a b2c user and assign the OCI Group to this user. (See Laurents Comment from 24. of June). If you need help, maybe Francesco also knows how to test it.

Florian Bühler | Distrelec If this Procedure is not ok, please call Adrian for further planning.

Best Jan

Hi Mark,
I can also help you to test and to create an OCI user.
Best regards

Hi Florian

Have you called Adrian for further planning? Compare the comment of Jan Widmer above.

Thx Mark

Hi Jan,
Please prepare it for testing.
I'll support Mark with the test then.

Hi Jan,

An additional question in this regard from my side: In the initial Webtrekk implementation-concept (compare excerpt-screenshot attached) it was specified that e-Proc (OCI & Ariba) redirects to country platforms are having dedicated TrackingID's on LIVE (373990480911673,580777942866624). Is that granted? If yes, I would a little amendment in this regard: Please include only 373990480911673 as TrackingID for e-Proc (OCI & Ariba).

Thx Mark

Hi Mark,

I am not sure, if this change is something regarding frontend, since I didn't have to do anything with those ID's.. Could you check with Francesco or Raphi Husi, if that is something stored in the Backend / Properties files?

Thanks Jan

Thanks for your feedback. I am opening a sub-task for that.

'Please prepare this ticket for testing' as indicated by Florian above.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark,

We were finally able to merge this one. The changes are tested and commited and getting deployed today..so you should be able to test it this afternoon. To be sure, just ask Raphi, if the deployment was done..

If you have questions regarding how to test it, Ruben can help you to create an OCI User..

Regards
Jan
Mark, please test

Hi Florian

Status: So far I cannot properly test this implementation. No tracking requests are triggered -> the subtask DISTRELEC-4777 is a blocker therefore.

Mark
Subtask DISTRELEC-4777 has been resolved by R. Husi. I am going to test this implementation upon next Q-deployment.
Changing the status to "resolved" as we are adapting the jira workflows. The status "testing" will be removed.

Tested on P (https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0) -> refactoring required (test-findings to follow via this ticket).

Please find the testing-results in the attached Word-file. Please verify and refactor (highlighted in green - according required values etc. in yellow) accordingly. In case of unclarities a short call before refactoring may be advisable. Thx Mark

Missing stuff:

  • custom ecommerce parameter discount value and voucher value are containing strings instead of values
  • Bottom Button also needs to trigger the call
  • numbers need to be float values
  • product costs and order value are wrong

=> Will be handled in a separate ticket (DISTRELEC-5087)

Hi Ruben,

I added the event also for the bottom "go to erp" button and fixed the above bugs. Could you please test the call by clicking on the bottom button on the cart page and also check if the orderValue and productCost Params are correctly?

Thanks, Jan

Since this is a never ending story I closed the ticket and created and linked a new one (DISTRELEC-5087) with the issues still unresolved.
(NB: In order to be able to reproduce which feature is available in which version, we should not reopen ticket, but create new ones and link them)

@Ruben: Please test and (if successful) assign to Mark for retesting.

Hi Mark,
Bug fixing has been commited. Ready to test after the next deployment.
Note that you have to test on Atos: test.a.distrelec.de
Thanks!

To test...

https://test.a.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=distrelec.test.oci@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=https://www.sap.com&oci_version=4.0

Please open this URL in a Chrome incognito window to avoid cache and cookies.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5182] DE // Open Orders History not updated after creating or modifying an order
item.description: Because of the cache on the OrderService the display of the new open orders and also the changes made to an existing open order are not shown immediately.
item.summary: DE // Open Orders History not updated after creating or modifying an order

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5178] Use COMPANY/PRIVATE instead of Z100/Z200
item.description:
In order to harmonize the interface IF-08 we want to get rid of usage of Z100/Z200 (old) and use the specified values COMPANY/PRIVATE (new) instead.

I already change the logic in the IF-05 and IF-08 to accept old and new values:

  • Z100 or COMPANY for the B2B case
  • Z200 or PRIVATE for the B2C case

AFTER the rollout of DE Lodestone can add a mapping on PI. See Sub-Task.

Please keep this task open as long as the Sub-Task in not resolved.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5151] Task: Implement approval-flag
item.description:
Description
In order to close the business-process, customer service needs an additional flag in Hybris to finally activate the newly created contacts. Customer Service only approves on the following cases: C1, C3

Requirement

  1. A flag called "Approved by customer-service" should be implemented on contact-level and should be placed near the "activated with double opt-in"-checkbox.
  2. When this flag is set a routine is triggered which sends out an email to the contact to be able to set the password.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please refer to the attached process to find out where it needs to kick in.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5149] Hybris // Change the payment codes for ELFA SAP countries

Please change the payment code definition in Hybris according:

item.summary: Hybris // Change the payment codes for ELFA SAP countries

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5123] Sanity Check CronJob notification uses wrong template
item.description:
The sanity check cronjob notification uses the default notification template instead of the defined sanity check notification template.

The template definition was changed from a RendererTemplate to an EmailPage Type. But the cronjob model requires a RendererTemplate.
item.summary: Sanity Check CronJob notification uses wrong template

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Raphael,

I saw that you have changed the template definition of the sanity cronjob notification.
The default behavior of a cronjob notification uses a RendererTemplate and not an EmailPage.
If i set the Email Template to the newly created RendererTemplate "Email_Sanity_Check_Notification_Body" then the notification works as aspected.
Are there any important advantages if we use the EmailPage way?
If not, i would like to revert some of your changes and use a simple RendererTemplate for the Email Template. So that we can use the standard behavior of the cronjob notification.

Best Regards
Pascal Forster

Hi Pascal

Yes you are right. You can revert my changes and go back to the "normal" Template for CronJobs.
Please just have a look that you have the email template in the same Impex like the other ones so that we have them consolidated in one place.

BR
Raphael
I have fixed the template
Fixed: Some values were missing in the email.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5041] Wrong content in IF-05 punchout for customer type
item.description:
Hi Evangelos,
can you please review the content sent in IF-05 for customer type punchout (erp_punchoutfilt_ct-20140915095342611.csv)

Salesorganisation;CustomerID;Materialnumber;Product_Hierarchy;Date_valid_from;Date_valid_until;Timestamp_modificat
;Z200;11015105;;20140612;99991231;20140915095341
  • SalesOrg infromation is missing
  • CustomerID (Z200) looks bad

Thank you!
Cheers,
Adrian
item.summary: Wrong content in IF-05 punchout for customer type

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hello Adrian,
They have have some articles which are supposed to be for professional use only and we maintain the records as B2B and B2C. I checked in wiki and I don't see anything that has been maintained there about this case. We have never mentioned anything?

@Evangelos: As already discussed I have removed the column SalesOrg in the IF-05 CT PunchOut specification (https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters).

We also perform the mapping from Z100 / Z200 to the value we internally need (B2B / B2C).

Task for you:

  • Please remove the first column in the export. This value was empty in the test. But the semicolon is now obsolete and shall be removed.
  • Please update the header in the CSV file:
    • "Salesorganization" can be removed
    • CustomerID should be CustomerType

The above example should finally look like this:

CustomerType;Materialnumber;Product_Hierarchy;Date_valid_from;Date_valid_until;Timestamp_modificat
Z200;11015105;;20140612;99991231;20140915095341

Hello Ligia,
Could you please adjust and send also to Maciej afterwards?
Regards,
Evangelos

Hello Maciej,

Please remove sales organization and after that I will regenerate proxy and update the code in ABAP.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Changes done on D, will affect Elfa and NewSAP.
Please let me know when transpor to Q/P.
guys please send to Q

Hello Maciej,

Please send it to Q. My transport should go after yours.

Best Regards,
Ligia
@Evangelos: the changes are in Q.

@Maciej: A minor minor minor thing: In the CSV file header (1st line) there is still the comment "Salesorganisation;" which is misleading. Please remove.
But import of the 1 record in the NewSAP export is working now.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3218] Additional Event-Tracking of Clicks on Teaser-Tracking Elements
item.description:
For all Webtrekk Teaser-Tracking implementations (compare WT-Spec chapter 9) the following functional amendment (Event-Tracking – compare WT-Spec chapter 8.2 p. 18/19) is required regarding click-event on any teaser-elements:

"onclick=wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'[[Teaser-Tracking ID]]',sendOnUnload:1}

);"

Thereby two Webtrekk-requests are fired when a user is clicking on any teaser-element.

Briefly pre-discussed the above requirements with Dominic Modalek via phone (12.2.14).

Thanks! Mark
item.summary: Additional Event-Tracking of Clicks on Teaser-Tracking Elements

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Estimate 3 Days Frontend Work. No Backend Work needed.

This change affects many different components and therefore needs some time to implement and test.
Reconsider after go-live of 1.1

Mark, I assign it to you until this will be reconsidered again.

Info: only track onClick, not on shifting to the left or right in a carousel.

Hi Florian

To be foreseen for v1.3 if possible.

Thx Mark

Hi Dominic,

I have tested the implementation on distrelec.at. On the Homepage (Carpet) on click on a teaser-item two requests are transmitted (as required - compare attached screenshots): A request showing the click-event (ck524: 1) and another one transmitting the ct-parameter.
Please note that if the teaser is not containing a product, the image-name is so far not transmitted as part of the ct-parameter value (compare red arrow in screenshot).

Other Teaser-implementations such onsite-search overview (e.g. http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone) and 'Ähnliche Produkte' respectively 'Kunden, die diesen Artikel gekauft haben, kauften auch' (e.g. http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Office-2013-Professional-eng-Microsoft-269-16093/p/11063276) do onclick not transmitting a request containing a ct-parameter. Besides a request containing the click-event (ck524: 1) is not transmitted.

Please verify and refactor accordingly.

Bests, Mark
